title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (https://www.contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available https://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/.

what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBuckner
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBuckner
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBuckner
text: data/*.rda — Unified ggseg_atlas objects (2D + 3D one object) R/data.R — Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegBuckner-package.R — Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats data-raw/ — Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBuckner
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg::geom_brain() (2D) ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBuckner
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegBuckner
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: Work Progress — package active development yet officially released. Buckner cerebellar functional parcellation ggseg ecosystem.

title: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: can install package GitHub :

title: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
code: library(ggseg) #> Loading required package: ggseg.formats library(ggsegBuckner) library(ggplot2)  ggplot() +   geom_brain(     atlas = buckner7,     mapping = aes(fill = label),     position = position_brain(. ~ view),     show.legend = FALSE   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = buckner7$palette, na.value = "grey") +   theme_void() +   ggtitle("Buckner 7-network cerebellar parcellation")

title: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
code: ggplot() +   geom_brain(     atlas = buckner17,     mapping = aes(fill = label),     position = position_brain(. ~ view),     show.legend = FALSE   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = buckner17$palette, na.value = "grey") +   theme_void() +   ggtitle("Buckner 17-network cerebellar parcellation")

title: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: Buckner RL et al. (2011). organization human cerebellum estimated intrinsic functional connectivity. Journal Neurophysiology, 106(5), 2322-2345.

title: Buckner 17-Network Cerebellar Parcellation — buckner17
text: Cerebellar parcellation 17 functional networks Buckner et al. (2011). Contains 2D polygon geometry 3D meshes.

title: Buckner 17-Network Cerebellar Parcellation — buckner17
text: ggseg.formats::ggseg_atlas object (subcortical).

title: Buckner 17-Network Cerebellar Parcellation — buckner17
text: Buckner RL et al. (2011). organization human cerebellum estimated intrinsic functional connectivity. doi:10.1152/jn.00339.2011

title: Buckner 17-Network Cerebellar Parcellation — buckner17
code: data(buckner17) buckner17 #>  #> ── buckner17 ggseg atlas ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Type: subcortical #> Regions: 17 #> Hemispheres: NA #> Views: axial_1, axial_2, axial_3, coronal_1, sagittal, coronal_2 #> Palette: ✔ #> Rendering: ✔ ggseg #> ✔ ggseg3d (meshes) #> ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> # A tibble: 17 × 3 #>    hemi  region        label         #>    <chr> <chr>         <chr>         #>  1 NA    17networks 1  17Networks_1  #>  2 NA    17networks 2  17Networks_2  #>  3 NA    17networks 3  17Networks_3  #>  4 NA    17networks 4  17Networks_4  #>  5 NA    17networks 5  17Networks_5  #>  6 NA    17networks 6  17Networks_6  #>  7 NA    17networks 7  17Networks_7  #>  8 NA    17networks 8  17Networks_8  #>  9 NA    17networks 9  17Networks_9  #> 10 NA    17networks 10 17Networks_10 #> 11 NA    17networks 11 17Networks_11 #> 12 NA    17networks 12 17Networks_12 #> 13 NA    17networks 13 17Networks_13 #> 14 NA    17networks 14 17Networks_14 #> 15 NA    17networks 15 17Networks_15 #> 16 NA    17networks 16 17Networks_16 #> 17 NA    17networks 17 17Networks_17

what: ggsegBuckner: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegBuckner-package
title: ggsegBuckner: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegBuckner-package
text: Buckner cerebellar parcellation 7 17 functional networks 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 2D polygon geometry 3D vertex indices, use 'ggseg' 'ggseg3d'.

title: ggsegBuckner: Buckner Cerebellar Functional Parcellation for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegBuckner-package
text: Maintainer: Athanasia Mo Mowinckel .m.mowinckel@psykologi.uio.(ORCID)

title: ggsegBuckner 1.0.0
text: Initial release buckner7 buckner17 cerebellar atlases unified ggseg_atlas objects ggseg 2.0 ecosystem.
